CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Distribution_type__c, "Local Sort Division" ), "Local Sort Division; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Distribution_type__c, "Same State Metro" ), "Same State Metro; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Distribution_type__c, "Same State Country" ), "Same State Country; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Distribution_type__c, "Other State" ), "Other State; ",null )
CustomField.label: Distribution Type Print Post
